DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Immunogenicity Hantaan Puumala Virus DNA Vaccines
DOC.detailed_description: The study enroll 3 randomized group 9 subject , along 3 alternate , total 30 subject . The study include one group subject inject HTNV DNA vaccine , one group inject PUUV DNA vaccine , one group inject HTNV PUUV DNA vaccine ( mixed ) , administer Ichor TDS-IM device . Subjects receive one dose vaccine Days 0 , 28 , 56 follow Day 240 . Subjects complete post-injection memory aid 14 day injection . Subjects evaluate safety immune response throughout study .
